name: Card Game (Samer)
description:
INSTRUCTIONS:

Use touch screen or mouse to move the card around.

Available for both Android and Windows.

--------------------------------------------------------

A simple card game where the 52 cards are shuffled and split evenly for both players. 

In each turn, the player place their top faced card to the middle ground stack until their card number matches the previous card in the middle ground deck, to earn all the cards available in the current middle ground deck and add them to their deck

the first player to run out of cards lose, and their opponent win
